Scorch.title: Scorch
Scorch.name: Scorch
Scorch.description: per stack: dealt 10 [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage on [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color]

Poison.title: Poison
Poison.name: Poison
Poison.description: You are poisoned. You will take poison damage every turn equal to 10% of your maximum life.

Sickness.title: Sickness
Sickness.name: Sickness
Sickness.description: per stack: [color=#ff3030]-10[/color] [color=#ff8030]Hit[/color], dealt 5 [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage on [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color]

Freeze.title: Freeze
Freeze.name: Freeze
Freeze.description: per stack: [color=#ff3030]-10 [/color][color=#50ffff]Dodge[/color], [color=#ff3030]-1 [/color][color=#20ff20]Speed[/color], dealt 5 [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage on [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color], dealt 1 [color=#af8f50]Blunt[/color] damage on [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]

Poise.title: Poise
Poise.name: Poise
Poise.description: per stack: [color=#5050ff]+5 Armor[/color], [color=#5050ff]+5 Block[/color], [color=#ffa050]+10 Accuracy[/color], [color=#ff5050]50% removed[/color] on [color=#ffff50]step[/color]

Repulsion.title: Repulsion
Repulsion.name: Repulsion
Repulsion.description: per stack: deal 1 [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to the attacker on [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]

Grace.title: Grace
Grace.name: Grace
Grace.description: per stack: take [color=#ffff50]-3[/color] damage, deal 3 [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to the attacker on [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]

Inflame.title: Inflame
Inflame.name: Inflame
Inflame.description: per stack: [color=#ffa050]+10 Accuracy[/color], [color=#ff8030]+10 Hit[/color], [color=#ff5050]50% removed[/color] on [color=#ffff50]being hit[/color]

Meditate.title: Meditate
Meditate.name: Meditate
Meditate.description: per stack: [color=#ffff50]+10[/color] damage dealt, [color=#ff5050]50% removed[/color] on [color=#ffff50]step[/color]

Berserk.title: Berserk
Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description:
grants an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color]
per stack: [color=#20ff20]+1 Speed[/color], [color=#ff3030]-10 [/color][color=#50ffff]Dodge[/color], [color=#ff3030]-10 [/color][color=#5050ff]Block[/color]

Evasion.title: Evasion
Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: per stack: [color=#50ffff]+20 Dodge[/color], [color=#ff5050]50% removed[/color] on [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]

Charge.title: Charge
Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: per stack: [color=#ffff50]+5[/color] damage dealt, [color=#ff5050]50% removed[/color] on [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]

Doom.title: Doom
Doom.name: Doom
Doom.description: per stack: dealt 5 [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage on [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]

Batform.title: Batform
Batform.name: Batform
Batform.description:
transformation: [color=#ffff50]attack range[/color] set to [color=#ff3030]1[/color], [color=#5050ff]Armor / Block[/color] set to [color=#ff3030]1[/color]
per stack: [color=#20ff20]+1 Speed[/color], [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] 5 on [color=#ffff50]hit[/color]

Snakeform.title: Snakeform
Snakeform.name: Snakeform
Snakeform.description:
transformation: [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] limited to [color=#ff3030]25[/color], [color=#ffff50]attack range[/color] set to [color=#ff3030]1[/color]
per stack: [color=#5050ff]+10 Armor[/color], [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] 1 on dealing more than 75 [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage

Wormform.title: Wormform
Wormform.name: Wormform
Wormform.description:
transformation: [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] limited to [color=#ff3030]25[/color], [color=#ffff50]attack range[/color] set to [color=#ff3030]1[/color], [color=#5050ff]Block[/color] set to [color=#ff3030]1[/color]
per stack: apply 2 [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] to all enemies in a 3 tile range on [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]

Sparkform.title: Sparkform
Sparkform.name: Sparkform
Sparkform.description:
transformation: [color=#20ff20]+30 Speed[/color], [color=#ffff50]attack range[/color] set to [color=#ff3030]1[/color], [color=#5050ff]Block[/color] / [color=#5050ff]Armor[/color] set to [color=#ff3030]1[/color]
per stack: deal 10 [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range on [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]
